path /v3/tron/trc20/transaction
opid trontransfertrc20
params None
sum send trc20 tokens to a tron account

oneof
type object
props
fromprivatekey
type string
minlength 64
maxlength 64
desc private key of the address from which the trx will be sent
to
type string
minlength 34
maxlength 34
desc recipient address of tron account in base58 format
tokenaddress
type string
minlength 34
maxlength 34
desc address of the trc20 token to transfer
feelimit
type number
minimum 0
desc fee in trx to be paid
amount
desc amount to be sent in trx
pattern ddd

tokenaddress

amount
